name: PULOMA
overview:
Puloma is a cross-border online marketplace for global customers to access high-end European brands though style.

Style (e.g. classic, chic, ethnic, vintage) is the engine that allows global customers to access these brands and their products. As customers navigate and like / buy products, Puloma gets a continuously better understanding of their style and is thus in a better position to propose items and brands that they will like.

Puloma provides services to empower brands to market and sell their products globally. The services are as follows: translation & localization services, photo shooting, order preparation, global logistics solution, global customer support…

Puloma also provides services to empower customers to resell the products they like to their friends and network. Each customer can create a store with the products they like and become an affiliate reseller.
